options.content:
See Individual Tasks for $Country

Globus Tasks by Country

This dashboard shows top tasks with the specified country as the source or destination.
The first set of tables show top twenty data by both volume and rate and then the set of top pairs of organizations sharing data.
Other statistics about data to and from this country, including a Sankey graph for the top sources by volume, is then listed.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_country_name:$Country AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.dst_country_name:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

targets.query: meta.dst_country_name:$Country AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND -meta.src_country_name:"" AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)
